Package dao

Class IngredientDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.IngredientDAO
public class IngredientDAO
extends java.lang.Object
Data Access Object for Ingredient table in database. Provides encapsulated methods for controller to get, update, create and delete data in the Ingredient table.
Author:
Hanzhi.Zhuang

      use the given id to update the ingredient in the database with the given ingredient information in the object.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - with the id of the ingredient in the database that you want to update.
      Returns:
